root.name: Scooby-Doo Case File #2: The Scary Stone Dragon
root.description: Plot As the Gang visits China to celebrate the Chinese New Year, they find out that a Scary Stone Dragon has been scaring the tourists away. The gang needs to find out who is behind this Scary Stone Dragon and end the madness. GameplayThe game features point-and click gameplay, as well as some minigames, in one of which the player can dress up Scooby-Doo in Chinese festive costumes. The player also needs to search for clues and can meet charecters which are all suspects. System RequirementsWindows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista (NT not supported) Pentium 266Mhz Processor 64MB RAM (512MB for Vista) 100mb hard disk space 16 bit 640x480 colour screen Direct X compatible video card Direct X 8 or later Speakers Mouse (Recommend) Internet browser
